attributes.action: confirm the role of wives of political leaders, public figures and consorts - "behind every great man, is a great woman !""
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to address if people are elected to actually do the job, represent constituents, or have a jolly good time, at taxpayers expense, with all the sherrianigans that go with it. 
No one will match Jackie Kennedy, anyway, for "Through the keyhole" as a fashion icon. I urge the British govt to give better advice to it's ministers on this matter. I'm not saying that spouses aren't lovely, but that's not the point.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
